question: Which company has signed pact with Airports Authority of India (AAI) to manage three airports including that in Thiruvananthapuram?
explanation:
The Adani Group recently signed a concession agreement with the Airports Authority of India (AAI) for the operation, development and management of three airports.
The airports include those at Jaipur, Guwahati and Thiruvananthapuram. The Adani Enterprises won the bid before two years. It is to take the airports within six months and will manage, develop and operate the airports for 50 years.
